name: Flight 180
description: '''Flight 180''' (first known as '''180''' or '''One Eighty''') was an American [[Christian ska]] band, with punk and swing influences, from [[Orange County, California]]. Fronted by Kim Tennberg, singer and songwriter, they formed in 1998 and disbanded in 2001, releasing three albums with [[BEC Recordings]]: ''Crackerjack'' (1998), ''Lineup'' (1999) and ''Girls and Boys'' (2001).
